title.en: Einen Koyou wa Kanou deshou ka

altTitles.ja: 永年雇用は可能でしょうか
永年雇用は可能でしょうか ~無愛想無口な魔法使いと始める再就職ライフ~

altTitles.ja-ro: Einen Koyou wa Kanou deshou ka: Buaisou Mukuchi na Mahoutsukai to Hajimeru Saishuushoku Life

altTitles.en: Re-employment Life With an Unsociable Untalkative Magician
Is Long-Term Employment Possible ~ My Reemployment Life With an Unsociable Untalkative Magician

description.en: Lucille was recently fired from her job as a maid after an adultery scandal. This is her re-employment life story with a silent unfriendly magician in a quiet town, away from the scandals.

altTitles.ja: センチメンタル・ダーリン

description.en:
**Sentimental Darling**
Ryosuke and Shun are in their fourth year of college and have been dating for five years. They've been happy together every day, and it's been smooth sailing... but lately, even when they've had sex, it's just been "good work". I want to cherish our time together! I want us to be more intimate! So Ryosuke decides to make a plan...?

**Sentimental Boy**
Ryosuke and Shun have known each other since they were children, and they've taken it for granted that they'll always be together. But one day, Sun confessed to Ryosuke about his unexpected feelings for him!

Also includes Come Here Neko-san, to the Clapping Hands (Neko-san Kochira, Te no Naru Hou e)

(Source: Kasakura Shuppansha, translated)

altTitles.ja: メリーさん

description.en:
Mary-san who calls you on the phone, telling you she's nearby...nothing but a prank call, right? Witness the cute and charming life she lives!

This is based on the Japanese urban legend Mary-san.  If it makes no sense at all to you, see https://www.kowabana.net/2018/06/09/mary-san/ and it will be a lot more comprehensible, while still being cute.

altTitles.ja: キングダム

description.en:
Millions of years have passed since the times of legends, when the worlds of man and gods were still the same. In these times it was the desires of man that moved the world. It is the era of the 500 year war: The warring states period. Kingdom is the story of a young boy named Shin who grew into a great general and all the trials and bloodshed that lead him there.  

---
  
- **Won the Osamu Tezuka Cultural Grand Prize in 2013**
- **Earned a Guinness World Record on December 12, 2012 for Manga written by the most people. -Note- The record was due to its "Social Kingdom" campaign in which fans and other artists were given the task of redrawing the entire 26th volume.**

As of June 2022, Kingdom has over 90 million copies in circulation, making it one of the currently best-selling manga series of all time. 

Parution: Weekly Young Jump

---

**Officially Translated:**  
- In French by [Meian](https://www.meian-editions.fr/meian/licence/kingdom/1131)  
- In Italian by [J-pop](https://j-pop.it/it/fumetti/manga/kingdom.html)
description.fr:
**Cette Histoire se déroule avant notre ère.**

La chine, qui n'est pas encore unifiée, traverse une grande guerre de cinq siècles. Shin, un jeune garçon contemporain de ces temps violents et houleux, cherche, par la seule force de son épée, à se faire un nom sous les cieux !!!
___
**Kingdom en France, le manga tant attendu ! Véritable phénomène au Japon !**
- Élu meilleur manga au 17e Grand Prix Culturel Osamu Tezuka (2013)
- Meilleur manga seinen vendu au Japon depuis 2015 (source : Oricon)
- 3ème meilleur manga vendu au Japon en 2016 et 2017 (source : Oricon)
description.pt-br: Milhões de anos se passaram desde os tempos de lendas, quando os mundos dos homens e deuses ainda eram os mesmos. Nestes tempos eram os desejos do homem que mudaram o mundo. É o período da guerra de 500 anos: a Era dos Reinos Combatentes. Kingdom é a história de um garoto órfão e pobre tem o sonho de se tornar um grande general e assim começando seu caminho de provações e derramamento de sangue que o levarão até o topo das lendas!

altTitles.ja: みーちゃんとアイリ

description.en: Midori, a corporate slave, is being worked to death day and night. Her meals come from the convenience store, her refuge is alcohol and cigarettes, and she goes home only to sleep - such are the utterly wasteful days she leads. On her way home one day, she discovers a girl sleeping in the dumpster. She helps the girl on a whim, who introduces her self as Airi, a **witch**(!) with mysterious powers. Airi begs her, "Please let me stay with you for a while", and so begins their strange cohabitation life!? Warm and fluffy relief has arrived to Midori's weary days. These two mismatched ladies, a corporate slave office worker and a mess of a witch, begin their cohabitation life! (Translated from BookWalker)

title.en: Imprisoned with the Horror Game's Male Lead

altTitles.en: Confined Together with the Horror Game’s Male Lead

description.en:
I became a maid inside of a horror game.
Penalties were given to the male lead, who was trying to escape being locked up in a large mansion, and I acted as a guide. 

I was going to fulfill my duties until the male lead’s play ends.

“When I get out, I’ll lock you up exactly the same way.”

The male lead is so noisy. 
If it’s going to be like this, I’ll just help him escape faster. 

“Let’s eat, Dietrich.”
“This is a potion, it’ll help you recover faster if you take it.”
“The hint to escape is over there…”

I fed him well to prepare for the next play, and when the male lead got hurt, I gave him a potion so he could quickly play the next game,
I even gave him a hint for the problem. 

You’ll be able to get out now, right?

However. 

“I don’t really know the answer.”

What’s the meaning of this? Aren’t you supposed to be smart?

…The male lead doesn’t think about leaving the mansion at all. 

“If you won’t get out, I will.”

I shouted in anger because I was so sick of the thought of having to see the face of someone I don’t want to keep seeing. 

“Is it possible for you to get out of here?”

His eyes sank bitterly. 

“Let me tell you this, I have no intention of leaving this place.”
“What?”
“And you have no way of getting out, either.”

What the hell is going on?

title.en: Kobayashi-san Chi no Maid Dragon: Lucoa Is My xx

altTitles.ja-ro: Kobayashi-san-chi no Maid Dragon: Lucoa wa Boku no ×× Desu
Kobayashi-san-chi no Maid Dragon: Lucoa wa Boku no Chomechome Desu
Kobayashi-san-chi no Maid Dragon: Lucoa wa Boku no xx Desu

altTitles.ja: 小林さんちのメイドラゴン ルコアは僕の××です。

altTitles.zh-hk: 小林家的龍女僕 露可亞是我的XX

altTitles.zh: 小林家的龙女仆 露可亚是我的XX

description.en: A spin-off of Kobayashi-san Chi no Maid Dragon focusing on Shouta living with Lucoa as his familiar.
description.ru: Спин-офф Дракон-горничная Кобаяши-сан рассказывает о Шоте, живущим с Лукоа в качестве его фамильяра.!

altTitles.ja: サキュバスがやってきたお話

description.en: The story of a Succubus who comes to the human world to absorb life force energy. Accidentally, she lives as a child in a strange man's house.

altTitles.ja: アルカロイドの花嫁
Alkaloid Bride

description.en: Romelia, a lonely girl, and Kutli, a young high-ranking soldier, are solemnly married in the presence of God. What they share, however, is not "conjugal love," but the "unbearable fate" they have mutually borne.

Armonia, an abandoned child, was considered bad luck due to her ability to talk to monsters. Despite growing up alongside monsters and having limited knowledge of the human world, she ventures into the human realm to protect the Walter Forest, her cherished homeland. There, she encounters Hyde, the commander of the Subjugation Troope, whom she must persuade to stop the Subjugation.

"Do you not wish to kill monsters?"
"Why is there so much troll snot?"

Their first meeting goes awry from the start. As the story unfolds, a chaotic fantasy romance develops between the female protagonist, who considers monsters as her family, and the male protagonist, who suffers from monster phobia.

altTitles.ja: メスガキわからせシリーズ
好きになって欲しかっただけなのに。

altTitles.zh-hk: 明明只是想讓你喜歡我

altTitles.ja-ro: Suki ni Natte Hoshikatta Dake Nano ni

altTitles.es-la: El Camino a Casa Después de la Escuela

altTitles.ja: 放課後帰宅びより

altTitles.pt-br: Viagem para casa depois da escola

description.en: Shun was invited to the Going-Home Club by Naoki Satou, also known as "Chokki-chan". Despite refusing, he ends up being somewhat forcefully involved in the club's activities! A Going Home Club rom-com featuring a detour-loving high school girl and a new high school student who has lost his dream.
description.ja:
佐藤直希こと“直帰ちゃん”から帰宅部に勧誘された瞬。断ったのに、半ば強引な形で活動に参加させられるハメに！ 寄り道大好き女子高生と夢を失った新入生が紡ぐ帰宅部ラブコメディ！

---

Satō Naoki koto “chokki-chan” kara kitaku-bu ni kan'yū sa reta Shun. Kotowatta no ni, nakaba gōin'na katachi de katsudō ni sanka sa se rareru hame ni! Yorimichi daisuki mesukōsei to yume o ushinatta shin'nyūsei ga tsumugu kitaku-bu rabukomedi!
description.es-la: Shun fue invitado al Club de Irse a Casa por Naoki Satou, también conocida como "Chokki-chan". A pesar de negarse, acaba involucrándose a la fuerza en las actividades del club. Una comedia romántica del Club de Irse a Casa protagonizada por una chica de preparatoria amante de los desvíos y un nuevo estudiante de preparatoria que ha perdido su sueño.

altTitles.ja: 一途ビッチちゃん
一途でビッチな後輩

description.en: A story about a flirty kouhai seducing her senpai.
description.pt-br: Uma kouhai vai tentar todas as maneiras românticas e talvez eróticas para seduzir seu senpai.

altTitles.ja: 前向きに死ね！

description.en: He did it all for the sake of love. Onodera Yuzuki, a man with an absurd fate, begins his life-threatening confession!

Tek can't use Techs, but he joins the Royal Guard to make Futura great again!


♥ Animated Trailer: youtube.com/watch?v=mbzaZMvZtPM
♥ Discord: discord.gg/pVZts8fdTf

altTitles.hi: मेरे स्मार्टफोन के साथ दूसरी दुनिया में

description.en: After a freak accident involving some lightning winds up zapping him dead, 15-year-old Mochizuki Touya wakes up to find himself face-to-face with God. "I am afraid to say that I have made a bit of a blunder" laments the old coot. But all is not lost! God says that he can reincarnate Touya into a world of fantasy, and as a bonus, he gets to bring his smartphone along with! So begins Touya's adventure in a new, anachronistic pseudo-medieval world. Friends! Laughs! Tears! Inexplicable Deus ex Machina! He sets off on a journey full of wonder as he absentmindedly travels from place to place, following whatever goal catches his fancy. The curtains lift on an epic tale of swords, sorcery, and smartphone apps!
description.vi:
Mochizuki Touya, 15 tuổi là main giống như bao anh main khác khi đang trên đường về nhà lại bị… sét đánh lăn đùng ra chết :v.Điều đáng nói ở đây là sau khi chết anh main lại bị triệu tập đến trước mặt Thượng đế với lý do: Ổng vô tình… hại chết anh main mà không hay biết. Và để đền bù thì ảnh đã được hồi sinh sang một thế giới song song khác với 1 cái Sì mát phôn (Smartphone :v).
Thừa hưởng trong mình một di sản to lớn về những nền văn minh cổ đại, anh thong dong đi trên con đường đơn độc tại một thế giới khác trong khi sở hữu một nguồn sức mạnh thậm chí có thể giúp anh làm bá chủ của cả thế giới thời bấy giờ.
Càng đi anh càng tạo thêm cho mình nhiều đồng chí quan trọng và trước khi kịp nhận ra… anh đã ngày càng lún sâu vào những bí mật được cất giấu tại thế giới đó…
description.pt-br: Touya Mochizuki foi acidentalmente morto e, como uma desculpa, Deus lhe permite renascer em um mundo de fantasia e lhe concederá qualquer coisa que ele desejar. E assim, Touya escolhe manter seu smartphone no próximo mundo. Em sua segunda chance na vida, ele faz amizade com muitas figuras importantes e se depara com o segredo do mundo. Ele herda o legado de uma civilização antiga e viaja despreocupadamente enquanto possui poderes que rivalizam com os reis daquele mundo.

title.en: Neko no Te datte Yaku ni Tatsu

altTitles.ja: 猫の手だって役に立つ

altTitles.en: Even a Cat's Paw Can Be Useful

description.en:
One day, Takase's beloved cat Mi-chan transforms into a human! Can Mi-chan make Takase, who loves cats but has no interest in human girls, fall in love with her?

(Source: Seikaisha, translated)
description.ja:
猫!? それとも人!?

ある日、高瀬くんが愛でていた猫のみーちゃんが人間に大変身!
なんと、みーちゃんは人間に変身できる猫だった!
猫は大好きだけど、人間には素っ気ない高瀬くんをみーちゃんは振り向かせることができるのか!?

猫大好き&人間キョーミなしの高瀬くんと、人間に変身できる猫のみーちゃんの、猫まみれラブコメ!

title.en: Touhou Ibara Kasen ~ Wild and Horned Hermit.

altTitles.en: Eastern Thorned Poet Hermit ~ Wild and Horned Hermit.

altTitles.ru: Тохо Ибаракасэн ~ Дикий и Рогатый Отшельник

altTitles.ja: 東方茨歌仙　～ Wild and Horned Hermit.

altTitles.de: Der Rosenpoet des Ostens ~ Wild and Horned Hermit.

altTitles.uk: Тохо Ібаракасен ~ Дика та Рогата Відлюдниця

description.en:
In this 10 volume official Touhou series, spanning the time period of nine long years between the UFO and WBaWC games, we follow the misadventures of the business inept shrine maiden Reimu Hakurei and her ever-curious friend Marisa Kirisame, who meet a mysterious, young hermit woman named Ibara Kasen.  
  
Upon seeing how sloppily the Hakurei Shrine conducts its business, she decides to become a regular shrine visitor, determined to lend her near unlimited wisdom to the shrine maiden, in order to make her place a proper Shinto Shrine. Does the nagging, yet well meaning hermit bring nothing but good-will with her advice, or is there something more sinister hiding behind the friendly face and her bandaged arm?
description.pt:
De Zun, Wild and Horned Hermit é o último mangá da série Touhou, seguindo os passos de Silent Sinner in Blue, Inaba the Moon & Inaba the Earth e a triologia Sangetsusei.  
Desta vez, Marisa encontra uma misteriosa eremita fora da aldeia humana, No entanto, ela contou para Reimu sobre essa mulher, sendo vista ao redor do Santuário, ela é Ibara Kasen, uma estranha asceta com um braço enfaixado por causa de uma certa habilidade desconhecida da natureza, cujo mantem uma disciplina mais consciente do que elas e de qualquer um em Gensokyo.

title.en: Make the Exorcist Fall in Love

altTitles.ja: エクソシストを堕とせない

altTitles.th: เอ็กซอร์ซิส ไม่มีวันตกหลุมรัก

description.en: As the strongest exorcist, a boy chosen by God was engaged in mortal combat with the Demon Kings. Although he bears the fate of humanity on his shoulders, he actually wants to make sweets peacefully. One day, he meets a girl... This is a story of love and hope growing in the midst of a holy war.
description.ja: 神に選ばれし少年は、最強のエクソシストとして魔王たちと死闘を繰り広げていた。人類の命運を背負いつつも本当は静かにお菓子作りをしていたい、そんな彼に訪れた一人の少女との出会い…。これは壮絶な聖戦の中で芽吹いた、恋と希望の物語。

title.en: The Skeleton Soldier Failed to Defend the Dungeon

altTitles.en: Skeleton Soldier Couldn't Protect the Dungeon

altTitles.pt-br: O Soldado Esqueleto Que Não Conseguia Proteger a Dungeon

altTitles.ja: 骸骨兵士はダンジョンを守れなかった

altTitles.zh: 骷髅骑士没能守住副本

description.de: Die Abenteuer eines scheinbar schwachen Skelettsoldaten, dessen einziges Ziel es ist, seine Herrin, Lady Sukkubus, zu beschützen und ihr zu dienen. Sein Traum eines friedlichen Lebens mit ihr findet ein jähes Ende, als die beiden von einer Gruppe Krieger brutal ermordet wird. Aber aus einem kläglichen Ende wird ein hoffnungsvoller Neuanfang, als der Skelettsoldat sich 20 Jahre in der Vergangenheit wiederfindet! „Ich muss Lady Sukkubus vor all dem warnen!“ Aber ohne besondere Kampffähigkeiten und einer Geschichte voller Fehlschläge und Verluste, wie kann er diese grauenvolle Zukunft abwenden? Folge dem Skelettsoldaten in seiner bisher wichtigsten Mission: Seine eigene Geschichte neu zu schreiben.
description.en:
The Skeleton Soldier, a meager but fiercely loyal fighter who serves to protect its master, Lady Succubus. Its dream of a peaceful life with her is shattered when they're both brutally murdered by a group of warriors one day.

But what would’ve been a pathetic end to an unremarkable soul sparks a new beginning: when the Skeleton Soldier opens its eyes again, it has traveled back 20 years in time!

“I must warn Lady Succubus of all the things to come!”

But with no special combat skills and a history of failure and defeat, how can it stop the horrible events from unfolding again?

Follow the Skeleton Soldier as it faces the most challenging quest of all — rewriting the ending to its own story.
description.fr: Découvrez le Soldat Squelette, le frêle mais loyal combattant, se battant pour protéger sa maîtresse, Dame Succube. Son rêve d'une vie paisible à ses côtés est réduit à néant le jour où ils sont tous les deux brutalement assassinés par un groupe de guerriers. Mais ce qui allait être une fin tragique se révèle être en fait un nouveau commencement : le Soldat Squelette se réveille de nouveau... 20 ans plus tôt ! Il doit prévenir sa Dame du danger qui les guette, mais sans compétences au combat, et un large historique de défaites, sera-t-il capable de sauver leur avenir ? Suivez ce courageux squelette dans sa quête pour changer le cours du temps et son tragique destin !
description.ja: 「お守りできず、申し訳ありません…」　名もなきモンスター「骸骨兵士」は、主のサキュバスを守れぬまま、自分の弱さを嘆きつつ心半ばで朽ち果てる…が、いきなり20年前に蘇る！何度死んでも蘇り、蘇るたびに経験値も蓄積されていく謎のシステムまで付加された。「このチャンス、逃さないでおくべきか」いつか再会するであろうサキュバス様を守るため、骸骨兵士は強くなることを誓う
description.ko:
"지키기 위해서 나는 강해진다!"


이름 없는 일개 몬스터 '해골병사'.

자신의 주인인 서큐버스를 지키지 못한채 죽임을 당한다.

그러나,

갑자기 20년 전으로 돌아간다?!

일생일대의 최대의 기회!


자신이 지키기 못한 서큐버스를 위해서

해골은 성장해 나간다!
description.ru: Защитить хозяйку было его единственным предназначением, но он не смог исполнить его. Однако судьба дарует ему новый шанс. Шанс стать сильнее и спасти свою госпожу. Шанс переписать историю.
description.zh: 骷髅骑士发现自己回到了20年前，这一世骷髅骑士立志要好好守护主人。然而...都死了那么多次，怎么还没找到守护主人的正确打开方式！一次不行那就再来第二次，第二次不行那就来第三次…这是一个可以无限次重生的骷髅骑士的奇幻历险故事。
description.pt-br: Seu único propósito era proteger sua mestra. Mesmo assim ele foi incapaz. Mas o destino tinha mais reservado a ele já que conseguiu uma nova chance para proteger sua mestra e mudar seu destino.
description.zh-hk:
「為了守護珍愛的一切，我必須變強!」
無名怪物「骷髏士兵」沒能守護自己的主人魅魔，
便慘遭殺害。

然而，他卻突然回到了20年前?!
這是千載難逢的絕佳機會!

為了自己上次守護不了的魅魔，
骷髏將會努力成長!

description.en:
Ha Jae, who’s contemplating death on the rooftop due to bullying. A senior appears before him and suddenly pushes Ha-Jae off?! But, he wakes up safely in the Nurse’s Office in school. Ha-Jae’s retaliation against the bullying that the delinquents have started again ends in failure…

But, Siwoon appears before him yet again and coaches Ha-Jae to defeat the delinquents in one strike using his fist.

The presence of the Murim appears hidden under what seems to be an ordinary school, and the perilous adventure to the world of Murim begins.

title.en: Okorippoi Gal wo Date ni Sasotte Mita

altTitles.ja: 怒りっぽいギャルをデートに誘ってみた

altTitles.en: I Tried Asking a Hot-Tempered Gal Out on a Date

altTitles.fr: J'ai essayé de demander à une Gal à fort caractère de sortir avec moi

description.ja: 怒りっぽいギャルをデートに誘ってみた

title.en: The Day I Stopped Being Best Buddies with a Female Skater

altTitles.ja: スケーター女子とマブダチじゃなくなる日

altTitles.ja-ro: Skater Joshi to Mabudachi ja Nakunaru Hi

altTitles.en: The Day a Skater Girl and I Stopped Being Besties

description.en:
Children who are beginning their youth.  
Their growing pain on their way to spring.

altTitles.th: สงครามเรือรบสยบโลก

altTitles.ja: 蒼き鋼のアルペジオ

description.en:
Suddenly, a fleet of ships with mysterious super-weapons called the "Fleet of Fog" appeared all around the world. Humanity didn't have the technology to fight such a fleet, so they were driven out of the sea…  
Seventeen years after the battle, for some reason, Gunzou Chihaya and his crewmates aboard the I-401 and the personification (Mental Model) of the I-401, Iona, started fighting the Fleet of Fog…  


---
Official Release:
- Indonesian release by Elex Media

altTitles.ja: 私のアリカ

description.en: A huge incident happens to Arika, the center of a hugely popular idol group. Is the culprit a fan? Or could it be... The light and dark sides of the glamorous idol industry are now exposed!
description.ja: 人気急上昇中のアイドルグループのセンター・アリカの身に起きた大事件。犯人はファンか、それとも‥‥。華々しいアイドル業界の光と闇が今暴かれる！
description.vi:
Mamiya Arika, nữ hát chính của nhóm nhạc thần tượng "Lyrical Trick" bỗng mất tích một cách bí ẩn. Và đầu mối duy nhất về dấu vết của cô chỉ đơn giản là một đoạn video camera an ninh.
Liệu đây có đơn giản chỉ là hành vi của một fan hâm mộ quá khích, một idol otaku hay không...!?

title.en: The Ghost and the Exhausted Office Worker

altTitles.ja: 幽霊と疲れた会社員

description.en:
A story about an old ghost and the exhausted office worker he watches over as he gradually learns to find meaning in his life.

Original by [@yukiyuki_nkym](https://twitter.com/yukiyuki_nkym) on Twitter.

altTitles.ja: バツハレ

description.en: The story begins with the protagonist, Wakou Ichiro, who decides to return home early from work to celebrate his second anniversary with his wife. But, when he opens the door of his house.... He finds his wife cheating on him! Although the marriage was short-lived, his life changes again when suddenly, a certain woman appears in front of him? Thus begins a new story, a new erotic comedy!
description.ja: ２度目の結婚記念日。仕事を終えて帰宅した和光市路が目撃したのは見知らぬ男と交わる妻の姿だった──！住み慣れた我が家、幸福な日々、そして愛する人を失った和光だったが、そんな彼の前に現れたのは…！？
description.vi: Câu chuyện bắt đầu khi nhân vật chính, Wakou Ichiro về nhà sớm để kỷ niệm 2 năm ngày cưới với vợ mình. Nhưng bất ngờ khi mở cửa ra thì... Anh phát hiện vợ mình đang làm tình với người đàn ông khác. Cuộc hôn nhân dù ngắn nhưng cũng làm cuộc sống của anh thay đổi một lần nữa. Bất ngờ một cô gái xuất hiện trước mặt anh, câu truyện vừa hài vừa lứng sẽ bắt đầu?
description.es-la: La historia empieza con el protagonista, Wakou Ichiro, quien decida regresar temprano a casa del trabajo para celebrar su segundo aniversario con su esposa. Pero, cuando abre la puerta de su casa... ¡Se encuentra a su esposa siéndole infiel! A pesar de que matrimonio duró muy poco, su vida vuelve a cambiar cuando de repente, frente a él se aparece cierta mujer... ¡Así comienza una nueva historia, una nueva comedía erótica!

title.en: Salaryman Exorcist - Okumura Yukio no Aishuu

altTitles.ja-ro: Salaryman Exorcist: Okumura Yukio no Aishū

altTitles.en: Salaryman Exorcist: The Sorrows of Okumura Yukio

altTitles.ja-ro: Salaryman Futsumashi Okumura Yukio no Aishuu

altTitles.ja: サラリーマン祓魔師 奥村雪男の

description.en: A spin-off of Ao no Exorcist, following Okumura Yukio as the main protoganist.

Na Kang Lim, a high school student who enjoys reading webtoons, experiences a strange event one day when the female lead from his favorite webtoon appears before him. Even more surprising, the same incidents that put her in danger in the webtoon start happening in real life. The problem is, there's no protagonist in the real world to save her! Ultimately, Na Kang Lim takes on the role of the protagonist, looping through time to save her.

title.en: Fate/Grand Order: Fujimaru Ritsuka Doesn't Get it

altTitles.ja-ro: Fate/Grand Order: Fujimaru Ritsuka wa Wakaranai

altTitles.ja: Fate/Grand Order 藤丸立香はわからない

altTitles.fr: Fate/Grand Order : Ritsuka Fujimaru n’a rien pigé

description.en: New short comedy manga based on Fate/Grand Order.

altTitles.ja: 悪女はマリオネット

altTitles.th: นางร้ายหุ่นเชิด

altTitles.vi: Kẻ Phản diện chỉ là Một Con Rối

description.en:
"Beauty cannot be real power."

Cayena, the Imperial Princess, was known as the most beautiful woman in the Empire. She was a woman who knew nothing but evil and luxury. However, she was destined for ruin: she would be used as a chess piece by her younger brother to secure his throne and killed by her crazy husband.

"I'll make you the emperor."

"…Sister, you're going to make me the emperor?"

"In exchange, give me freedom."

She had to change things before she became *that* Cayena.

---
I woke up as Kayena Hill, the novel’s villainess, praised as the greatest beauty in the empire. Who knew that her story would catch my attention because I was her in my past life? Destined for terrible ends, I’ve died twice—but I refuse to die a third time as a pawn in someone else’s scheme. I’m no longer the vain and naïve princess. Now that I know how the story will unfold, I’ll turn the tables around and have everyone dancing to my tune. This time, I’ll be the one pulling the strings.

---
**Original Webtoon:** [Daum](https://webtoon.kakao.com/content/%EC%95%85%EB%85%80%EB%8A%94-%EB%A7%88%EB%A6%AC%EC%98%A4%EB%84%A4%ED%8A%B8/2464), [KakaoPage](https://page.kakao.com/content/56422254)

**Official Translations:**
* English: [Radish](https://radishfiction.com/stories/17106), [Tapas](https://tapas.io/series/the-villainess-is-a-marionette/info)
* [Chinese (Simplified) / 汉语](https://www.podoteng.com/)
* [Chinese (Traditional) / 漢語](https://tw.kakaowebtoon.com/content/%E6%83%A1%E5%A5%B3%E6%98%AF%E6%87%B8%E7%B5%B2%E6%9C%A8%E5%81%B6/94)
* [French / Français](https://fr.piccoma.com/fr/product/231)
* [Indonesian / Bahasa Indonesia](https://id.kakaowebtoon.com/content/The-Villainess-is-a-Marionette/40)
* [Japanese / 日本語](https://piccoma.com/web/product/67171)
* [Thai / ภาษาไทย](https://th.kakaowebtoon.com/content/%E0%B8%99%E0%B8%B2%E0%B8%87%E0%B8%A3%E0%B9%89%E0%B8%B2%E0%B8%A2%E0%B8%AB%E0%B8%B8%E0%B9%88%E0%B8%99%E0%B9%80%E0%B8%8A%E0%B8%B4%E0%B8%94/117)
description.ru:
Принцесса Каена, прославившаяся своей красотой на всю Империю, не ведает ничего, кроме алчности и злобы. Долгое время она пыталась избавиться от своего младшего брата-тирана, но встретила смерть от руки своего мужа.
— Я помогу тебе стать Императором.
— Сестра… Вы обо мне?..
— Но в обмен… ты подаришь мне свободу.
До того, как «я» стану принцессой Каеной.

---
**Original Webtoon:** [Daum](https://webtoon.kakao.com/content/%EC%95%85%EB%85%80%EB%8A%94-%EB%A7%88%EB%A6%AC%EC%98%A4%EB%84%A4%ED%8A%B8/2464), [KakaoPage](https://page.kakao.com/content/56422254)

**Official Translations:**
* English: [Radish](https://radishfiction.com/stories/17106), [Tapas](https://tapas.io/series/the-villainess-is-a-marionette/info)
* [Chinese (Simplified) / 汉语](https://www.podoteng.com/)
* [Chinese (Traditional) / 漢語](https://tw.kakaowebtoon.com/content/%E6%83%A1%E5%A5%B3%E6%98%AF%E6%87%B8%E7%B5%B2%E6%9C%A8%E5%81%B6/94)
* [French / Français](https://fr.piccoma.com/fr/product/231)
* [Indonesian / Bahasa Indonesia](https://id.kakaowebtoon.com/content/The-Villainess-is-a-Marionette/40)
* [Japanese / 日本語](https://piccoma.com/web/product/67171)
* [Thai / ภาษาไทย](https://th.kakaowebtoon.com/content/%E0%B8%99%E0%B8%B2%E0%B8%87%E0%B8%A3%E0%B9%89%E0%B8%B2%E0%B8%A2%E0%B8%AB%E0%B8%B8%E0%B9%88%E0%B8%99%E0%B9%80%E0%B8%8A%E0%B8%B4%E0%B8%94/117)
description.zh:
帝国的皇女，卡也娜，被誉为帝国最漂亮的女人。 她也是一个除了邪恶与奢侈以外一无所知的女人。 但是，她注定会灭亡：她的弟弟用她作为棋子来保住自己的王位，而最终卡也娜也会被自己疯狂的丈夫杀死。 “我会让你成为皇帝。” “……姐姐，您是指我吗？” “作为交换，请给我自由。” 她必须在成为那个卡也娜之前扭转局面。

---
**Original Webtoon:** [Daum](https://webtoon.kakao.com/content/%EC%95%85%EB%85%80%EB%8A%94-%EB%A7%88%EB%A6%AC%EC%98%A4%EB%84%A4%ED%8A%B8/2464), [KakaoPage](https://page.kakao.com/content/56422254)

**Official Translations:**
* English: [Radish](https://radishfiction.com/stories/17106), [Tapas](https://tapas.io/series/the-villainess-is-a-marionette/info)
* [Chinese (Simplified) / 汉语](https://www.podoteng.com/)
* [Chinese (Traditional) / 漢語](https://tw.kakaowebtoon.com/content/%E6%83%A1%E5%A5%B3%E6%98%AF%E6%87%B8%E7%B5%B2%E6%9C%A8%E5%81%B6/94)
* [French / Français](https://fr.piccoma.com/fr/product/231)
* [Indonesian / Bahasa Indonesia](https://id.kakaowebtoon.com/content/The-Villainess-is-a-Marionette/40)
* [Japanese / 日本語](https://piccoma.com/web/product/67171)
* [Thai / ภาษาไทย](https://th.kakaowebtoon.com/content/%E0%B8%99%E0%B8%B2%E0%B8%87%E0%B8%A3%E0%B9%89%E0%B8%B2%E0%B8%A2%E0%B8%AB%E0%B8%B8%E0%B9%88%E0%B8%99%E0%B9%80%E0%B8%8A%E0%B8%B4%E0%B8%94/117)

description.en:
The best way for the diverse human beings who make up society to unite is to find themselves a common enemy. School is a mini-version of society, so why shouldn't the same thing happen in a classroom setting?  
  
This particular class has chosen Xiao Shang to be that common enemy. But one of its more popular students soon finds himself becoming intrigued by Shang's unapologetic, straightforward way of life.  

This comic is posted for free on the author's weibo: <https://weibo.com/u/3567976483>
description.pl: Najłatwiejszym sposobem zjednoczenia się różnorodnych jednostek, które tworzą społeczeństwo, jest znalezienie wspólnego wroga. Szkoła jest mini społeczeństwem, więc czy to samo nie powinno odbywać się w klasie? Ta konkretna klasa wybrała na wspólnego wroga Xu Shanga. Ale wkrótce jeden z najpopularniejszych uczniów w szkole staje się zaintrygowany specyficznym życiem Shanga.
description.pt-br: Ao e Xun são amigos desde a infância que mantêm um relacionamento secreto fora da escola, na mesma escola existe o aluno transferido Xiao Shang que esconde uma vida totalmente diferente através de sua natureza tranquila. Círculos Sociais significam aceitações e esses meninos buscam uma forma de como se encaixar nesse meio.

title.en: Kill the Male Lead to Become the Villainess

altTitles.zh: 杀死男主然后成为女魔头

altTitles.ru: Убить главного героя, чтобы стать злодейкой

altTitles.zh-ro: Sha Si Nan Zhu Ranhou Chengwei Nv Mo Tou
Shā Sǐ Nán Zhǔ Ránhòu Chéngwéi Nǚ Mó Tóu

altTitles.en: Kill the Male Lead to Become the Demoness

description.en:
After killing the male lead, the originally innocent girl transformed into a villainess.
Just as she was about to enjoy her newfound freedom, she died a violent death and returned back to the start of the game.
Having carried over with her all the skills she acquired in her previous "playthrough", she was prepared to kill the male lead again; however, the current circumstances seem a bit... strange?
description.ru:
Убив главного героя, девушка становится монстром в глазах других, но, собираясь насладиться свободой, трагично погибает и оказывается в начале игры. Сохранив знания и навыки из прошлой жизни, она собирается повторить своё убийство, однако происходящее кажется немного… странным.
«Да кто же ты такой?!»
description.zh: 杀死男主角后，原小白花女二黑化成了女魔头，正当她快意江湖的时候却暴毙回到游戏的开头。继承了上周目所有能力的她准备先下手为强再次杀死男主，只是现在的情况好像有点……意外？ “不对，你到底谁啊——？！”

description.en:
[Woojin, who has lost his memories x Hamin, who has had an unrequited love for 13 years] 

An accident occurs where Woojin forgets 13 years worth of memories with Hamin. This causes a lot of panic for Hamin, as he has harbored unrequited feelings for him for those 13 years. Seeing this reaction, a misunderstanding occurs where Woojin believes that they are dating…

title.en: Kiraware Majo to Karada ga Irekawatta Keredo, Watashi wa Kyou mo Genki ni Kurashiteimasu!

altTitles.ja: 嫌われ魔女と体が入れ替わったけれど、私は今日も元気に暮らしています！

altTitles.en: I Swapped Bodies With a Wicked Witch, But Today I'll Keep Having Fun!

description.en: A happy slow life begins with a switch! Marietta, princess of the snow country of Snewe, is trapped in a magic tower because she can't use magic. 8 years later, on her wedding day with the prince of the silver country, she thought she had succeeded in summoning a holy beast, but then... What appeared was...?
description.ja: 取り決めにより雪の国・スニューウから大国・ジルヴァラに輿入れしてきた王女・マリエッタ。しかし魔法が使えないマリエッタは塔に幽閉され、7年後に行われる聖獣召喚の儀式を成功させるため、ひたすら魔法の修行を強いられた。そして7年後見事に白い竜を召喚したマリエッタだが、次の瞬間謎の声にいざなわれ、気がつけば見知らぬ場所にいた。しかも見た目はそっくりなのに、どんな魔法も使えるほど魔力に溢れた身体になっていて…。

title.en: For You, I’ll Dress up in a Lie

altTitles.ja: 君のためにボクは嘘を着飾る

altTitles.ja-ro: Kimi no Tame ni Boku wa Uso wo Kikazaru

description.en:
Kuroyo Yuzuru, a bit of a plain boy, is always together with his best friend from childhood, Shirotama Kotaro.
They thought they could stay together forever even after they entered middle school...
One day, something happens that changes their relationship drastically.
description.ja:
ちょっぴり地味な男子「黒曜結弦」は親友の幼馴染「白玉小太郎」といつも一緒。
中学生になってもずっと一緒にいられると思ったのに…。
ある日二人の関係を大きく変える出来事が起きる。

altTitles.ja: バガボンド

description.en:
Growing up in the late 16th century Sengoku era Japan, Shinmen Takezou is shunned by the local villagers as a devil child due to his wild and violent nature. Running away from home with a fellow boy at age 17, Takezo joins the Toyotomi army to fight the Tokugawa clan at the Battle of Sekigahara. However, the Tokugawa win a crushing victory, leading to nearly three hundred years of Shogunate rule. Takezo and his friend manage to survive the battle and afterwards swear to do great things with their lives. However, after their paths separate, Takezo becomes a wanted criminal and must change his name and his nature in order to escape an ignoble death.  
  
**Awards:**
- Won the 24th Kodansha Manga Award in the general category in 2000.
- Won the Tezuka Osamu Cultural Prize in 2002 
**Note:** was nominated for the 2003 Eisner Award in the Best Writer/Artist category.
description.es:
Creciendo en el Japón de la era Sengoku de finales del siglo XVI, Shinmen Takezou es rechazado por los aldeanos locales como un niño demonio debido a su naturaleza salvaje y violenta. A los 17 años, Takezou se escapa de casa con un compañero y se une al ejército Toyotomi para luchar contra el clan Tokugawa en la batalla de Sekigahara. Sin embargo, los Tokugawa obtienen una aplastante victoria, lo que da lugar a casi trescientos años de gobierno del Shogunato. Takezou y su amigo consiguen sobrevivir a la batalla y después juran hacer grandes cosas con sus vidas. Sin embargo, cuando sus caminos se separan, Takezou se convierte en un criminal buscado y debe cambiar su nombre y su naturaleza para escapar de una muerte innoble.  
  
**Premios:**
    - Ganó el 24º Premio Kodansha de Manga en la categoría general en 2000.
    - Ganó el Premio Cultural Tezuka Osamu en 2002
    **Nota:** fue nominado al Premio Eisner 2003 en la categoría de Mejor Escritor/Artista.
description.es-la:
Creciendo en el Japón de la era Sengoku de finales del siglo XVI, Shinmen Takezou es rechazado por los aldeanos locales como un niño demonio debido a su naturaleza salvaje y violenta. A los 17 años, Takezou se escapa de casa con un compañero y se une al ejército Toyotomi para luchar contra el clan Tokugawa en la batalla de Sekigahara. Sin embargo, los Tokugawa obtienen una aplastante victoria, lo que da lugar a casi trescientos años de gobierno del Shogunato. Takezou y su amigo consiguen sobrevivir a la batalla y después juran hacer grandes cosas con sus vidas. Sin embargo, cuando sus caminos se separan, Takezou se convierte en un criminal buscado y debe cambiar su nombre y su naturaleza para escapar de una muerte innoble.  
  
**Premios:**
    - Ganó el 24º Premio Kodansha de Manga en la categoría general en 2000.
    - Ganó el Premio Cultural Tezuka Osamu en 2002
    **Nota:** fue nominado al Premio Eisner 2003 en la categoría de Mejor Escritor/Artista.

description.en: In a zombie apocalypse, a woman relentlessly fights for the search for new clothes so fiercely that the zombies begin to organize for better living conditions, on the other hand, a zombie with a high level of cooking wisely chooses its prey, demanding the seal. friboi, and as fate would have it, these two end up becoming lovers.
description.pt-br: Em um apocalipse zumbi, uma mulher luta implacavelmente pela busca por novas roupas de maneira tão feroz que os zumbies começam a se organizar por melhores condições de vida, em contra partida, um zumbi com alto nível de culinária escolhe sabiamente suas presas, exigindo o selo friboi, e por zueira do destino, esses dois acabam se tornando namorados.

title.en: Yumeochi ~Yume de Bokura wa Koi ni Ochiru~

altTitles.ja: ユメオチ～ユメで僕らは恋にオチる〜

altTitles.fr: Yumeochi : Rêver de tomber amoureux de toi

altTitles.pt-br: Yumeochi: Sonhando em me apaixonar por você

altTitles.en: Yumeochi: Dreaming of Falling For You

altTitles.id: Yumeochi: Bermimpi Tentang Jatuh CInta Kepada Mu

description.en: Even in university, Chono is stuck in the past regrets of his high school years. His dull days come to an abrupt end when he comes across a mysterious book... A book that allows him to return and re-do his high school life in his dreams. Follow Chono and the girls of his dreams as they reshape their wasted youths!
description.fr: Même à l'université, Chono est coincé dans les regrets de ses années de lycée. Ses journées ennuyeuses s'arrêtent brusquement lorsqu'il tombe sur un livre mystérieux... Un livre qui lui permet de revenir et de refaire sa vie de lycéen dans ses rêves. Suivez Chono et les filles de ses rêves alors qu'ils remodèlent leur jeunesse gâchée !
description.ja: やり残したことだらけの高校生活を送ったぼっち大学生の蝶野ツトム。空虚な日々を過ごす中で、偶然手にした不思議な本…。それはなんと、夢の中で超リアルな高校時代に戻れるものだった!!　関わることのなかった少女たちとの学園生活が始まる――。青春やり直し“夢”ラブコメ開幕!!
description.pt-br: Mesmo na universidade, Chono está preso aos arrependimentos do passado de seus anos de colegial. Seus dias monótonos terminam abruptamente quando ele se depara com um livro misterioso…. Um livro que lhe permite voltar e refazer sua vida de colegial em seus sonhos. Siga Chono e as meninas de seus sonhos enquanto reformulam seus jovens desperdiçados!

altTitles.ja: ウルフちゃんは澄ましたい

altTitles.id: Gadis Serigala Mencoba Untuk Berpura pura Tidak Peduli

altTitles.en: Wolf-chan Is Trying to Feign Indifference

description.en:
The cool, lone-wolf girl and her precious, unrequited crush!

(Source: Ganma!, translated)
description.ja: ウルフカットで一匹狼なクール系女子の尊い片想い！
description.pt-br: A loba solitária fria, e seu precioso amor não correspondido!

altTitles.ja: エリオと電気人形

description.en: The story centers around Anjie, an electric doll, and Erio, a human raised by her. In order for Erio to experience the outside world, the two set out on a journey.

altTitles.ja: 黒鷺死体宅配便

description.en:
Your body is their business!  
Five young students at a Buddhist university, three guys and two girls, find little call for their job skills in today's Tokyo…among the living, that is! But all that stuff in college they were told would never pay off — you know, channeling, dowsing, ESP — gives them a direct line to the dead…the dead who are still trapped in their corpses and can't move on to the next reincarnation.  
  
The five form the *Kurosagi* ("Black Heron”, their ominous bird logo) *Corpse Delivery Service*: whether suicide, murder, accident, or illness, they'll carry your body wherever it needs to go to free your soul! The kids from Kurosagi can smell a customer a mile away — it's a good thing one of the girls majored in embalming!

altTitles.ja: ラジエーションハウス

description.en: A new milestone in medical drama begins! A medical diagnosis mystery manga depicting the other side of medical care, the radiology department. Iori Igarashi is a talented radiology technician who has patiently waited for his chance to work with An Amakasu, his childhood friend. After being hired at her family's hospital, he is determined to fulfill a promise that he made with An when they were younger. Unfortunately, having been out of touch for years, she doesn't recognize him and it doesn't help that she also isn't a fan of the way he performs his duties. As all sorts of cases come into the department, she must acknowledge his skills and learn to work together so that patients can receive the best treatment possible. While the two of them adapt to each other, will An recognize her childhood friend, who has been working with her all this time?

altTitles.ja: 愛してるゲームを終わらせたい

altTitles.fr: Je veux finir le jeu du "je t'aime"

altTitles.th: เกมสารภาพรักนี้น่ะเรามาจบกันเถอะ

altTitles.zh: 想让“我爱你”游戏快点结束

altTitles.en: I Want to End the "I Love You" Game
I Want to End This Love Game

description.en: Childhood friends who have been together since they were little. They both realize their feelings for each other, but are too close to be honest. What connects them is the "I love you game" that they have been playing since they were little. The end of their love is decided in this simple game where the winner is the one who makes the other embarrassed!
description.pt-br: Amigos de infância que estão juntos desde que eram pequenos. Eles percebem seus sentimentos pelo outro, mas são muito próximos para serem honestos. O que os conecta é seu “jogo do eu te amo”, que eles brincam desde que eram pequenos. O fim do seu amor é decidido nesse jogo simples onde o vencedor é aquele que deixa o outro com vergonha!

title.en: The Lecture You Would Never Want Your Parents To Give You

altTitles.ja: 親に絶対されたくない説教

altTitles.ja-ro: Oya ni Zettai sa Retakunai Sekkyou

altTitles.fr: Le sermon que vous ne voudriez jamais recevoir de vos parents

altTitles.ru: Лекция, которую вы бы не хотели услышать от родителей

altTitles.vi: Bài Thuyết Giáo mà ta Không bao giờ Muốn nghe từ phụ Huynh

title.en: I Brought Home a Succubus Who Failed to Find a Job.

altTitles.fr: J'ai ramené chez moi une Succube qui ne trouve pas d'emploi

altTitles.es: Llevé un Súcubo a casa que no pudo encontrar trabajo

altTitles.ja: 就活失敗したサキュバスさんを拾いました

altTitles.pt-br: Levei para casa uma súcubos que não conseguiu encontrar um emprego.

description.en: Man brings home succubus, doesn’t get fucked. Instead, gets a cute succubus to take care of him.

title.en: The Most Heretical Last Boss Queen Who Will Become the Source of Tragedy Will Devote Herself for the Sake of the People. ~To the Savior~

altTitles.ja: 悲劇の元凶となる最強外道ラスボス女王は民の為に尽くします。～To the Savior～

altTitles.ja-ro: Higeki no Genkyou to Naru Saikyou Gedou Last Boss Joou wa Tami no Tame ni Tsukushimasu.: To the Savior

description.en:
At the age of eight, I realised I had reincarnated as the nefarious last boss of an otome game, Queen Pride. Her fighting strength is high because she’s the last boss who will fight with the capture target, and her superior cunning wits make her the most powerful first princess in a matriarchal country. Since she brings misfortune to all that surrounds her, what awaits is a future of ruination! …really, wouldn’t it be better if I died?

In this case, I’ll avoid destruction from the capture target and freely use my authority and cheat abilities to save everyone!

---

**Note: This manga is continuation of the canceled manga, be sure to read that one first (check the related tab)**

Immediately after Gu Changge realized he had transgressed into a fantasy world, the world's protagonist, and fortune's chosen, vowed to take revenge on him. Envied by all, not only is the female lead head over heels for him, but he's also treated as a distinguished guest wherever he goes. Fortunately, Gu Changge's prestige and power are superior to everyone else's, so shouldn't it be easy to trample on a mere fortune's chosen?

Hold on… There’s a system dedicated to milking and harvesting the protagonist? Gu Changge smirked. “Seems like even fate wants me to fulfill my destiny as the villain of this world!”
description.fr: Dès que Gu Changge s’est rendu compte qu’il avait transgressé un monde imaginaire, le protagoniste de ce monde, l’élu de la fortune, a juré de se venger de lui. Envié par tous, non seulement la femme principale est folle de lui, mais il est également traité comme un invité de marque partout où il va. Heureusement, le prestige et le pouvoir de Gu Changge sont supérieurs à ceux de tous les autres, alors il ne devrait pas être facile de piétiner un simple élu de la fortune ?
description.id:
Begitu Gu Changge menyadari dia telah masuk ke sebuah dunia fantasi, protagonis dunia itu yang dengan beruntungnya terpilih, bersumpah untuk melakukan balas dendam terhadapnya. Semua orang sangat iri pada Protagonis itu, karena bukan hanya karakter utama wanita tergila-gila padanya, tapi dia juga selalu diperlakukan sebagai tamu kehormatan kemanapun dia pergi. Untungnya, martabat dan kekuatan Gu Changge jauh melebihi milik orang lain, sehingga dia tidak dengan mudah jatuh di tangan orang yang hanya terpilih karena keberuntungannya?

 

Tunggu dulu… ada sistem yang didedikasikan untuk meraup dan mengambil dari apa yang dimiliki protagonis? Gu Changge tersenyum. “Sepertinya takdir pun ingin aku memenuhi takdirku sebagai orang jahat di dunia ini!”
description.pl: Gu Changge zostaje przeniesiony do świata wuxia, gdzie z miejsca staje się obiektem nienawiści protagonisty, będącego Wybrańcem Losu, gdyż nie dość, że główna bohaterka rzuca mu się w ramiona, to jeszcze jest przez wszystkich traktowany niczym znamienity gość. Na szczęście jego postać cechuje znacząca siła, więc powinien bez trudu zmiażdżyć jakiegoś w czepku urodzonego dzieciaka, prawda? “Chwila… Otrzymałem wyspecjalizowany system, który pozwala mi okradać głównego bohatera ze szczęścia?” Gu Changge uśmiechnął się znacząco. “Zdaje się, że moim przeznaczeniem jest podążanie ścieżką prowadzącą do stania się największym czarnym charakterem w tym świecie!”
description.ru:
Гу Чангэ попадает в фэнтези-мир, где, по-классике, оказывается в шкуре главного козла отпущения.
Удивительно, что главный герой сразу же снизыскал расположение у императрицы, чем вызвал бурю ненависти в свой адрес. К счастью, Чангэ - уважаемый человек в городе и единственное, что его спасает от кары в данной ситуации это высокий статус в обществе. Подождите-ка... а вы уже знаете, что здесь есть необычная система рангов, в которой присутствуют яркие герои всех мастей? Проанализировав события, герой понимает, что выгоднее всего вжиться в свою новую роль и пойти по пути персонажа-злодея!
description.pt-br: Imediatamente após Gu Changge perceber que havia transmigrado para um mundo de fantasia, o protagonista do mundo, e o escolhido da fortuna, jurou se vingar dele. Invejado por todos, ele não só tem a liderança feminina de ponta-cabeça por ele, mas também é tratado como um distinto convidado onde quer que vá. Felizmente, o prestígio e o poder de Gu Changge são superiores aos de todos os outros, então não deveria ser fácil pisar em uma mera escolha da fortuna? Espere … Existe um sistema dedicado à ordenha e colheita do protagonista? Gu Changge sorriu. “Parece que até o destino quer que eu cumpra meu destino como o vilão deste mundo!”

altTitles.ja: 緋弾のアリア
緋弾のアリア 紫電の魔女

description.en:
Tokyo Butei High School - a special school where armed detectives, also known as "Butei" are trained. Tohyama Kinji is a sophomore student who has a unique body which activates a "super mode" when stimulated by "something." He tries to hide it from others in order to live a peaceful life. But trouble finds him when he becomes a victim of a bombing incident, where he meets the Butei High "Assault" department elite, Aria H. Kanzaki.  
  
**Note:** Chapter 94 and above (as well as the corresponding volumes) were retroactively relabeled with the subtitle "The Purple Lightning Witch" and their numbering was rebooted − so chapter 94 is "Shiden no Majo chapter 1" and volume 17 is "Shiden no Majo volume 1". Otherwise, the story continues normally.  
  
[See AnimeNewsNetwork for the anime.](https://www.animenewsnetwork.com/encyclopedia/anime.php?id=11451)
